events.text: The monitor is a glow with information. Casefiles and strange numbers scroll across the screen.

events.question: In the top right of the screen you see a notification...

events.text: We would like to keep the filing office at the end of the hall locked. More over, we demand the key be hidden by a memetic protocol. As your office has such a protocol in action, it is your responsibility to secure the key. Thank you.
You walk away from the computer, not wanting to touch anything.
